Control Statement: The organization centrally manages the flaw remediation process.Supplemental Guidance:  Central management is the organization-wide management and implementation of flaw remediation processes. Central management includes planning, implementing, assessing, authorizing, and monitoring the organization-defined, centrally managed flaw remediation security controls.
